title: Ticket #2188: Fix authentication regression tests
description: Several of the authentication regression tests have been disabled for quite some time, because attempts to make the reliable have failed to date. Security-related regression tests seem like a poor choice to sit around disabled, as evidenced GSI breaking in the middle of a stable series (see #2187).
remarks:
2011-May-24 09:44:06 by gthain:
Note that all these tests in question test authentication negotiation, not all authentication methods. In particular, there don't test GSI. There is a GSI test, but apparently, it has never worked.

2011-May-24 10:13:42 by zmiller:
yes, some basic tests need to be added, and they are not hard. the certificates needed can be generated as part of the test, and i now have scripts to do so.
